scenario.sendMessageH248: MEGACO/3 [[remoteHostH248]]:[remotePortH248] Reply = [transaction] { ImmAckRequired, Context=[contextID]{ Priority = 1, Modify=[[termID(0)],[termID(1)]] { Media{ Stream=1{ LocalControl{ Mode=IN, tman/sdr=800, ds/dscp=0x00, ReservedValue=ON, ReservedValue=OFF, ReservedGroup=ON, ReservedGroup=OFF, pkg/param0=0, ;extensions pkg/param1>1, ;extensions pkg/param2<2, ;extensions pkg/param3#3, ;extensions pkg/param4=[4,5,6], ;extensions pkg/param7={7,8,9} ;extensions }, Local{ v=0 o=mhandley 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4 [localHostH248] s=SDP Seminar i=A Seminar on the session description protocol u=http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/M.Handley/sdp.03.ps e=mjh@isi.edu (Mark Handley) c=IN IP4 [localHostH248] t=3034423619 3042462419 a=type:H332 a=recvonly:20 b=CT:128 m=video [rtpPort1] RTP/AVP 98 i=mavideo a=rtpmap:98 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:98 mode-set=1+octet-align=1+crc=0 b=SA:256 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248] m=audio [rtpPort2] RTP/AVP 96 i=monaudio a=rtpmap:96 L8/8000 b=CT:128 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248] }, Remote{ v=0 o=mhandley 2890844526 2890842807 IN IP4 [localHostH248] s=SDP Seminar i=A Seminar on the session description protocol u=http://www.cs.ucl.ac.uk/staff/M.Handley/sdp.03.ps e=mjh@isi.edu (Mark Handley) c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 t=3034423619 3042462419 a=type:H332 a=recvonly:20 b=CT:128 m=video 49232/2 RTP/AVP 98 i=mavideo a=rtpmap:98 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:98 mode-set=1+octet-align=1+crc=0 b=SA:256 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 m=audio 49230/3 RTP/AVP 96 i=monaudio a=rtpmap:96 L8/8000 b=CT:128 c=IN IP4 [localHostH248]/127 }, Statistics{ pkg/param1=1, pkg/param2=[2,3,4,5], nt/dur= 231, nt/or= 0, nt/os= 0, rtp/delay= 0, rtp/jit= 0, rtp/pr= 0, rtp/ps= 0, xnq/fcumpl= 0, xnq/ncumpl= 0, xnq/nvrange= 0, xnq/rtdmax= 0 } }, TerminationState { ServiceStates = { Test, OutOfService, InService }, Buffer = OFF, Buffer = LockStep } } } } }
